contentrichtext.text: {{other uses|Quicksand (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox Film | name = Quicksands | image = | image_size = | caption = | director = [[Allan Dwan]] | producer = | writer = | narrator = | starring = [[J. Warren Kerrigan]]<br>[[Charlotte Burton]]<br>[[Vivian Rich]] | music = | cinematography = | editing = | distributor = [[Mutual Film]] | released = June 30, 1913 | runtime = 2 reels (approximately 20 minutes) | country = United States | language = Silent film<br> [[English language|English]] intertitles }} '''''Quicksands''''' is a [[1913 in film|1913]] American [[silent film|silent]] [[short film|short]] [[drama film]] directed by [[Allan Dwan]]. The film stars [[J. Warren Kerrigan]], [[Charlotte Burton]], [[Vivian Rich]], [[George Periolat]], [[Jack Richardson (actor)|Jack Richardson]], [[Louise Lester]], and [[Chick Morrison|Charles Morrison]] ==External links== *{{imdb title|id=0257023}} [[Category:1913 films]] [[Category:1910s drama films]] [[Category:American drama films]] [[Category:American silent short films]] [[Category:Black-and-white films]] {{short-silent-film-stub}}
